headline: A Look At Cigna Group’s (CI) Valuation As Earnings Optimism And PBM Risks Shape Expectations
summary: The Cigna Group (CI) is back in focus as investors look ahead to its upcoming fiscal fourth quarter 2025 earnings report, with analysts expecting profit of $7.90 per share, approximately 19% higher than the figure reported a year earlier. See our latest analysis for Cigna Group. At a share price of $283.97, Cigna Group has seen a 6.98% 1 month share price return but a 7.43% 3 month share price decline. Its 5 year total shareholder return of 37.82% contrasts with a slightly negative 3 year...
